document.full_text: as usual, a lot of the games have gone down to the buzzer. but this year, an unusually high number of them have produced moments when coaches and fans ask, 'what was he thinking'?
document.title: 2011 n.c.a.a. tournament: head-scratching plays dominate the n.c.a.a.
lines_and_colors: as usual, a lot of the games have gone down to the buzzer. but this year, an unusually high number of them have produced moments when coaches and fans ask, 'what was he thinking'?
